title: A Fu Xun Gui Ji
synopsis: In 2130, human beings forgot the virtues and society fell into turmoil. In order to save the world, the top scientist Dr. Tianji extracted the virtue energy from the ancient moral education classic "Disciple Guidance", created a magical elf-Afu, and sent it back to collect the virtue energy. Ah Fu returned to 2013 and met Rongzai, who had just started kindergarten, and helped each other with Rongzai and his friends, and successfully collected virtue energy. Dr. Doudou, the old opponent of Dr. Tianji, intends to destroy Dr. Tianji's plan and plunge the world into darkness. With the efforts of Ah Fu and others, Dr. Doudou was eventually knocked down and probated. The dark clouds covering the future world are dissipating. (translated from iqiyi)
